
This directory contains external libraries that are synchronized directly 
from external repositories.

local/ - contains local clones on which changes and rxperiments can be made.

iglib/ - contains checked out versions of libraries that are used by
    IGLib and related software.



Info:
Configuring a remote for a fork - GitHib:
https://docs.github.com/en/github/collaborating-with-pull-requests/working-with-forks/configuring-a-remote-for-a-fork
